amendment.description: To strike a tax increase that would result in higher consumer prices for gasoline, heating oil, and other energy sources for Americans earning less than $400,000 per year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 289.

action.text: Amendment SA 5301 proposed by Senator Graham to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4170-4171; text: CR S4170) To strike a tax increase that would result in higher consumer prices for gasoline, heating oil, and other energy sources for Americans earning less than $400,000 per year.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5301 proposed by Senator Graham to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 289.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5301 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 289.
